creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: many figures crying under a large tree at R; decorated pole at UR suspending a tied white bundle; two figures at R have red skin; two figures at center have ornate headpieces and jewelry; other clerical figures at bottom
medium: Ink and light colors on silk
title: Death of the Buddha, fragment
